properties.title: Main Area / Roadside
properties.description: Primary sector — The Warm-Up ⭐ (V1), Juggy Roof ⭐ (V2), Easy Overhang (V0). 3 sheltered problems for rain days. Flat landings, 50 yd approach. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: River Boulders
properties.description: Secondary sector — River Slab (V2), technical footwork problems along Meadow River bank. Exposed. 100-150 yd approach. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Upstream / Upper Meadow
properties.description: Exploratory sector — fewer documented problems, exposed. 150-200 yd approach. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Roadside Parking (Gravel Pulloffs)
properties.description: Multiple gravel pulloffs along US-60 E near Meadow Bridge. Free, no fee. Park near your target sector. [UNVERIFIED]
